Give it a look and let me know if you have any comments since new directors tend to be forgotten about until they make it big (at which time, everyone forgets their earlier directing attempts).

Body of Review: As one of the more productive reviewers of porn these days, I try to take a look at a variety of material in order to better judge what works, what doesn't, and why. By comparing and contrasting what you can buy, the end result is (hopefully) a means for consumers to get more of an idea as to the contents of a DVD than you can trust via the advertised box cover. Let's face it; I doubt the people who design box covers have seen the movies in question and most of what they say is pure marketing hype. That said, I found a lot to like when watching Absolute Ass earlier this year. Director Jordan Septo is a newcomer to directing porn and those of you who've watched newcomers come and go will know how much of a long shot such guys are for companies. Thankfully, the guy has some basic talent with which to work and that's half the battle. In the follow up volume of the series, Absolute Asses 2, his skills continue to refine and he offers up a host of even better gals for your viewing pleasure in the five scenes.
